extendedInfo.description: This app gives you access to a collection of effective management models. This app is designed as a tool for professionals who need a quick reference on these world famous models. In fact it is a quick informative guide which helps you to remind everything about these models. This app covers the following areas : - Strategic management - Change management - Culture - Marketing & Sales - Leadership and management Each model is provided with - information about the model (text) - image of the model - you tube video about the model (when available) This app also provides you with a chat area in which you can enjoy the comments or chats with everyone in the world who bought this app. Finally we constantly monitor the internet and send your app news about business modelling from about 4000 news sources as soon as it is available.
